data: The hot Arkansas sun shone hotly down upon Dead-Man’s Forest, that vast, sleepy army of trees which silently overlooked acres of treacherous swamp, silent glade, and tiny hillock.
Cato, the creeper; or, The demon of Dead-Man's Forest
